title: Les Miserables
creator_credit: Darryl F. Zanuck, Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation and Richard Boleslawski
brief_description: Victor Hugo’s classic story of an escaped convict, Jean Valjean (Frederic March) and the detective, Inspector Javert (Charles Laughton) who trails him for a lifetime. A remarkably exciting and moving film. Co-starring Cedric Hardwicke.
creator_credit_for_label: Darryl F. Zanuck, Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation and Richard Boleslawski
